title: Authors and Citation
text: Legoupil E (2024). iomtemplate: 'pkgdown' Templates IOM Packages. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/iom/iomtemplate.
code: @Manual{,   title = {iomtemplate: 'pkgdown' Templates for IOM Packages},   author = {Edouard Legoupil},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/iom/iomtemplate}, }

title: pkgdown Templates for IOM Packages
text: iomtemplate provides custom pkgdown template IOM packages. Please don’t use package. Inspired tidytemplate rotemplate.

title: pkgdown Templates for IOM Packages
code: Config/Needs/website: iom/iomtemplate template:   package: iomtemplate   bootstrap: 5
